channel.title: A Suggestion
channel.description:
Sorry if suggestions aren't aloud in here, but I just had an idea. Since there's been a little discussion about a level accomplish able after Senior Member... I think maybe, once you reach... say, 500 posts or 10 rep etc. You can take a quiz. See how there's bars up the top, Home, Help, Search, Profile, My Messages, Calender, Members, Logout. I think once you've reached the goal to take the quiz, a bar should appear, and you take the quiz. An Administrator would take a look, and score you. If you score above %90 percent, your rank becomes instead of Senior Member, it would be come, Senior Tutor, or something. I really agree it's a good idea...
Post your thoughts.
Or.... Instead of winning the extra rank, you be crowned like IRC Channel Cop. And in the IRC you will be given OP stats or something.

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Bebemycat2:

Or you could just say “Wow I have been on these forums for this long and I haven’t made community member, I’m obviously doing something wrong. Maybe I should be more helpfull or something along those lines”

Meh I got my last 38 rep quite unfairly, I never got my rep unset when aftermath + Ilya where repping people and getting repped back, I got around 15 rep in one night and never repped anyone back.

Although now community so far away, again. I should finish this guide I’m working on + release it.

item.title: A Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:11, topic:40954”]There will be no more post count ranks, because like many have said it would encourage spamming. Plus I like what bebemycat2 said:

[quote author=Bebemycat2 link=topic=57423.msg708618#msg708618 date=1167477324]
Or you could just say “Wow I have been on these forums for this long and I haven’t made community member, I’m obviously doing something wrong. Maybe I should be more helpfull or something along those lines”
[/quote][/quote]

If there will be no more post count ranks, then would that limit people from being promoted to a higher rank…?

Read full topic

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I think once you get senior member, you should take a quiz too. not suer if you said this, but it should be about beginner scripting, ethics/spamming questions, and about the nooks and crannies of this forum. It should be 20 questions, 10 scripting, 10 ethics and 1 nook and cranny(hard one) for extra credat
